title: Jade Raymond Leaves EA - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.22.18
description:
Get 30% off your subscription at http://lootcrate.com/games with promo code: GAMES

Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get 15% off your first purchase at http://thirdlove.com/games

Tim returns to Kinda Funny Games Daily with Greg to talk about Motive Studio Founder Jade Raymond leaving EA.

Time Codes -
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
 Extra Life 2018 is November 3rd! We’ll be streaming games and shenanigans for 24 hours as we raise money for Children’s Mirac
The Roper Report   -
00:05:20 - Jade Raymond Leaves EA, Dean Takahashi at Venture Beat
00:11:00 - Dreadnought Layoffs, Hayden Taylor GIB
00:16:30 - Why CCP Left VR, Chris Carter Destructoid
00:25:20 - Shadow of the Tomb Raider Review Bombed, Samuel Horti PCGamer
00:34:45 - Shout-out: 16-year old Joseph Saelee defeats 7 time Classic Tetris World Champ Jonas Neubaurer
00:36:05 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:41:10 - I’ve just seen IGN’s review - or should I say reviews - of COD Black Ops 4 and it’s got me wondering; how come this game deserves 3 separate scores? - George
00:46:06 - Greg, did the best buy event give you a better feeling about Fallout 76 and have you gotten to play it at all? Tim, Gaming Intel has leaked the possibility of an early-mid November Nintendo Direct. Do you think this is possible and what would you expect to see from it? - Saucy Biscuit
00:52:55 - You guys were big on PUBG and Fortnite, but it doesn't seem like that's the case with Black Ops 4. I assume it's timing of its release, but was wondering if there was something more to it. Do you eventually want to get into and maybe even stream Blackout? - Brandon
00:56:15 - Has the plethora of amazing games over the last couple of years shown us that there isn't even time to play all of the amazing games anymore? - Mr Hunter
00:59:53 - When and what kind of messaging can we expect surrounding the showcase to help set expectations? - Brandon Gann
01:03:48 - Squad Up: Dan Root(PS4) - KingsOfPain99
01:04:30 - One of them rotatin’ segments: Bad PSN Name - Alan Arroyo
01:05:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:
TUESDAY: Greg and Andrea
WEDNESDAY: Andrea and Dave Crouse (Stack Up)
THURSDAY: Greg and Jared
FRIDAY: Tim and Aiden Strawhun•
